text: Fernando James "Freddy" Ferrer (born April 30, 1950) is an American politician. He was the Borough President of The Bronx from 1987 to 2001, and was a candidate for Mayor of New York City in 2001 and the Democratic Party nominee for Mayor in 2005. ==References== Category:Bronx borough presidents Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:1950 births Category:Living people
title: Fernando Ferrer
